basics.label: Entrepreneur & Salesforce Product Owner
basics.summary: I’m a skilled business consultant, Salesforce product owner and technology leader with a passion for building products and advocating for building highly productive teams through better communication, well designed systems and processes.  I leverage more than 20 years of project and product management in application, SaaS, CRM (customer/case management systems), DMS (document management systems) and cybersecurity.  This experience includes development, architecture, sales, marketing and management experience with leading organizations, such as Capgemini, Deloitte and Protiviti.
